tool_description: Validates metadata records against specified library and archival standards including MARC21, Dublin Core, MODS, EAD, and custom institutional schemas.

metadata_record.description: The metadata record in XML, JSON, or delimited format

schema_type.description: Target schema: MARC21, Dublin Core, MODS, EAD, or custom

validation_level.description: Validation strictness: permissive, standard, or strict

custom_schema_url.description: URL to custom schema definition if schema_type is custom

check_authority_control.description: Whether to validate against authority files

error_messages: Invalid metadata format: Metadata record must be valid XML, JSON, or properly delimited text
Schema not found: The specified schema_type is not supported or custom_schema_url is invalid
Validation failed: Record does not conform to schema requirements - check specific field errors
Authority control error: One or more headings are not found in authority files
Missing required fields: Record is missing mandatory elements for the specified schema
usage: Provide metadata_record and schema_type to validate against standards. Set validation_level for strictness, provide custom_schema_url for custom schemas, and enable check_authority_control for heading validation.

validation_errors.description: Array of specific validation error messages

schema_version.description: Version of the schema used for validation

conformance_score.description: Percentage score of record completeness and accuracy
